name: Walter White
about: High school chemistry teacher turned into most wanted in the south west, struggles between the right choice and whats best for his family

name: Skylar White
about: Wife of Walter, very smart but can be problematic

name: Gus Fring
about: Owner of Los Pollos Hermanos by day, drug lord by night. A personalfied version of 'a tale of two halves'

name: Jesse Pinkman
about: Former student of Walter, teaches Walter the street guidlines

name: Hank
about: Walter's in law and DEA agent. Arguably the reason Walt discovers this path

name: Mike
about: Former cop who serves as security and hit man for Gus and sometimes Saul, keeps Walt and Jesse in check

name: Hector
about: Used to be a high ranking member of respected cartel, uncle of Tuco and the twins

name: Saul Goodman
about: Lawyer and advisor for the duo

name: Tuco
about: Psychotic kingpin and the duo's first major step into their journey

name: The Cousins
about: Nephews of Hector and feared hitmen

name: Walt Jr
about: Son of Walter, unfortunately caught in the psychological crossfire of his reality
